data.title: Dingy Club
data.text: Dark club with flashy lights and mediocre scenery. Bartenders can be very rude. Drinks are overpriced.

data.title: Find somewhere that appreciates your money
data.text: I will never spend any of my money at this place and suggest you do the same. Unless you believe it's right to have a club that judges who they let in strictly off appearance and RACE. I wish someone would shut down this place because it is not right to have a business that is so blatantly against civil rights. Not only would I never spend my money there, but I won't patronize any of the owners restaurants either.

data.title: Racist club
data.text: Have tried to get in multiple times it seems to me like they have a race problem. Not even in clubs out of town do I see so much discrimination. For example one Halloween some midget guy had to pay the guy at the door a couple hundred dollars JUST so HE can get in.  Ohhhhh and on another ocassion some guy was falling down the stairs blood and all I believe he even broke a leg and all they did was sit him on the side a little further away from the club and LEFT him there

data.title: DO NOT use your debit or credit cards. They WILL steal your money
data.text: I was going to say I had a lot of fun and would have given the the place 4 stars until I found out what Apartment 720 did to me just a couple of hours after I left. The person before me that said that they add whatever they want in front of the tip you give them when you use your debit/credit card is so right. They did that to me. I bought a drink for $11 added a $1 tip and signed off for the $12 total. But when I was talking to one of my friends once I got home, they told me to check my account balance because some clubs like to add what they want on your card instead of what you were actually charged. Sure enough, I saw the $11 charge plus an additional charge of $25 that was not supposed to be there. Excuse me but the last time I checked, when you sign for an amount, that's the amount the business is authorized to charge on your card, no more, no less. I will be calling them and demanding that extra $25 be refunded back to my card. Only use cash when you go out to places like this. I learned my lesson for sure. I'm not sure if I want to go back here (depends on the action they take to fix this problem)  but if I ever do come back, it will not be with my debit card.

data.title: They steal from you
data.text: Do not use your debit card there use CASH... They add whatever amount they want in front of the tip you give them... How does $5 go to 35? Damn stealers....

data.title: AWESOME!
data.text: Ok ok ok... standing in line was not fun but after getting inside I can see how its worth it. we had a great time and though it was a bit expensive we spent the whole time dancing so it was well worth it. At the end of the night after paying cover, drinks, and cab fare, we spent probably 65 a person. On a Saturday night I think it was well worth it. I just asked myself if I had 65 bucks worth of fun and I absolutely did. I cant wait to go back to milwaukee and party there again!

data.title: AWFUL, AWFUL, AWFUL!
data.text:
I've been a cocktail waitress and server for 3 years now. I've also been out to many places. NEVER have I EVER been so blatantly HARASSED so much in my entire life and I was only inside for about 10 minutes. It was AWFUL. Not even in the door for 3 seconds some guy grabs both of my arms and tries walking away with me after me  telling him I wasn't interested. NO BOUNCER MOVED an inch.  My complaints go on and on. Not to mention there's a frickin cover and their drinks cost $10.. not even great tasting and small.
If you have super low self-esteem and want the nasty attention, this place is just for you! 
I, however, have class and will never be returning here.

data.title: We also stood in line forever to get in...
data.text: We also stood in line forever to get in and all they did was let the people in that had vip. This is actually the second time I tried to get in to only never make it inside. The people at the door were very rude and I will never try to step foot in there ever again

data.title: One place to avoid in Milwaukee - Apartment 720
data.text: I went to Milwaukee for a girl's weekend to eat, drink and dance the night away, but it was not what we expected. Locals referred us to go dancing at a club called Apartment 720. We got to the club and there was a line to get in. We asked the bouncer to purchase VIP table service, but were denied entrance because their VIP section was too full. Several people left the club and they did not let any new patrons in. They did not communicate well and were extremely rude. Needless to say, we left the line and went to another establishment. If I visit Milwaukee again, I will NOT be visiting Apartment 720.
